divs: Sighting DetailsMy family had just returned home from seeing Christmas lights and my husband and step daughter first noticed it. I was wondering what they were looking at and I looked up and said oh its probably a helicoptor. Then watched it for a few mins longer to notice it was actual three different orbs that at first were one solid object and split off into three. I was cold and decided to go into the house and my husband came in and said that they seen more trail behind after a min and thought maybe they were Japanese lanterns. I thought no they wouldn't be up that high and we just left it at that.
Summary: three bright orangish colored objects at first then more followed way behind
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Comstock Park
There were no other sightings in Comstock Park on or around December 24th 2012
